segments.text: I observe the delinquent duo, the boy and girl, working together in such a mischievous way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork is almost adorable, though it makes me chuckle nervously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes are teetering, echoing the potential disaster just waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how children simply don’t see the dangers that adults so often fret about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s both exhilarating and terrible to witness their little act of rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely detached from this drama, lost in her mundane chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And I find myself wishing she would turn around and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR
